Params: {1: '1', 3: 'All of you, including Lucia, gather around the monitor in the cabin...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You watch the Golden Vortex, this majestic architectural wonder in the middle of the desert, collapses and falls.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Bianca was right. Nat holds a lot of intel that would be advantageous to us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm seeing a lot of Corrupted, though. Without the antigen, this place is completely taken over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The Punishing Virus concentration has crossed the safety threshold within seconds.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The Corrupted that's climbing out of the ruin... they're all guards we took down.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Really? Can you say for certain that we made no mistake...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Couldn't we have come up with a better plan? When we took down Nat, have we thought about...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...About how she could have stopped the Punishing Virus if we hadn't weakened the Golden Vortex's defense?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'She had suppressed the virus for such a long time...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee gives Bianca a pat on the shoulder, and she steps to the side. You stand in front of Lucia...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Sticks her face to the window) Wah! Those guards look like they're reborn... Nanami is so moved...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'That was quite a commotion! I can feel the quakes all the way here at the quarantine zone!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm fine, everyone! Sorry to have you all worried!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Shakes her head) No one was worried.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "(Laughs) You won't admit it because you're embarrassed! I've sent you the coordinates of the QZ. Get over here quickly! Liv is worried.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please notify the teams in the QZ that the Golden Vortex ruin is now a dead zone with a huge number of Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Our newest order is to establish quarantine zones around the Golden Vortex and hunt down the infected guards.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nat, the Golden Construct, is also buried in the ruins. She might be infected already, but we need to make sure her frame is intact.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'We can ask to whitelist her, but the authority to do so lies in the Strategic Intelligence Unit...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Anyway, get to the QZ first, and we can discuss all of that later.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Corrupted struggles with its dying breath, but there is nothing it can do...'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "(Observes the Corrupted crawling out of the ruin) How annoying... I guess there wasn't another way..."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The highly concentrated Punishing Virus covers the ruin with a red glow. Inside it stand countless figures of the menacing Corrupted...'}
